data.comment: Flamengo kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Botafogo pushes forward through Pedro Raul, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 2, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Anderson Daronco signals a Botafogo throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 3, Rhuan for Botafogo has been booked by Anderson Daronco and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
In the minute 6, Pedro (Flamengo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 7, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo drive forward through Bruno Henrique. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 16, Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo push upfield and Pedro gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Botafogo defence.
In the minute 17, Pedro Raul's header is off-target for Botafogo.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 19, Anderson Daronco awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Flamengo.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bruno Nazario.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Flamengo push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Giorgian De Arrascaeta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
In the minute 28, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Gustavo Henrique (Flamengo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 28, Bruno Nazario is back on the pitch.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 30, Botafogo needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Flamengo's Everton Ribeiro attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Free kick Flamengo.
Giorgian De Arrascaeta (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 34, Anderson Daronco waits before resuming play because Rafael Forster for Botafogo is still down.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 37, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 38, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Botafogo's Rafael Forster is back in action after a slight knock.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Bruno Henrique for Flamengo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 42, Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruno Henrique is back on his feet again.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Botafogo are pushing forward but Victor Luis's finish is wide of the goal.
Anderson Daronco awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 45, Botafogo drive upfield and Pedro Raul gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo's Rhuan breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Botafogo with the kick-off.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Flamengo.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Pedro Raul of Botafogo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick Flamengo.
Flamengo's Everton Ribeiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Goal! Everton Ribeiro gives Flamengo a 0-1 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
Gerson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Flamengo's Bruno Henrique misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Attention is being given to Botafogo’s Rafael Forster and play has been suspended briefly.
Rafael Forster has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Flamengo.
Salomon Kalou is on a sub for Rhuan for Botafogo.
The home team replace Jose Welison with Matheus Barcelos da Silva.
In the minute 64, Matheus Barcelos da Silva (Botafogo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Botafogo's area.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Anderson Daronco awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo drive upfield and Pedro Raul gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramon Diaz (Botafogo) is making a third substitution, with Federico Barrandeguy Martino replacing Marcinho.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Gerson (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 76, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Luiz Otavio is replacing Caio Alexandre for the home team.
Lucas Campos is replacing Bruno Nazario for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Bruno Henrique with Vitinho. This is the first substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 80, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Caio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Rodrigo Caio for Flamengo is back on the field again.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 82, Flamengo make their second substitution with Rodrigo Muniz replacing Pedro.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 83, Everton Ribeiro is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Victor Luis Botafogo.
In the minute 87, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Michael replacing Everton Ribeiro.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Botafogo just outside Flamengo's area.
In the minute 89, Gustavo Henrique (Flamengo) has been sent off!
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Flamengo.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Anderson Daronco signals a Flamengo throw-in in Botafogo's half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
